column5: The boat I purchased has a little wear on the front keel. I think the previous owner ran it up on the shore a couple times and nicked a couple rocks with it. I think these keel protectors are best suited for fiberglass boats, but they are supposedly used on aluminums and I was wondering if anyone had any experience with these products. They aren't cheap, but I can see how they would prevent wear to the keel. Andy
